FuncDef:
The qos fabric-queue statistic command enables the statistics function for Virtual Output Queues (VoQs).
The undo qos fabric-queue statistic command disables the statistics function for VoQs.
By default, the statistics function is disabled for VoQs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the statistics function for VoQs, run the qos fabric-queue statistic command. This command applies to the ,LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-S/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L/LPUF-480/LPUF-480-B/LPUI-480/LPUI-480-B/LPUI-480-L/LPUF-480-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUF-400-E,LPUI-200/LPUI-200-L/LPUF-200/LPUF-200-B/LPUI-1T/LPUI-1T-B/LPUI-1T-L/LPUI-1T-CM/LPUI-241/LPUI-241-B/LPUI-241-CM/LPUF-241/LPUF-241-E/LPUI-480-CM/LPUF-52,LPUI-52/LPUF-53/LPUI-242/LPUF-243/LPUI-242-CM/LPUI-242-G/LPUI-402/LPUI-402-CM/LPUF-483/LPUI-2T-L/LPUI-2T-CM/LPUF-1T2.
